content: List of threads:Announce | Bounty | About usWelcome to the Eontribe! Our goal is to extend human capabilities, to make human intelligence more effective by training a neural network to the needs of each individual. Eontribe neural networks should become an extension of the human, a digital copy of the human under full user control. As a result, mundane or unpleasant tasks can be shifted to Eontribe, and the user himself can do exactly what brings him pleasureLearn more on our official website - http://eontribe.comJoin our exclusive bounty program and become an integral part of our project while earning amazing rewards. Your contributions will be instrumental in our success. Whether you're a social media guru, content creator, or community builder, we have tailored tasks for you. Showcase your talents, earn rewards, and exclusive merchandise, and join a passionate community united by our project's mission.Eons - This exclusive poral contains NFTs of varying rarity levels. Each NFT is valued up to $1000!DNA - These assets act as the key to unlocking the Eon chest. With DNA in your possession, you gain access to the hidden treasures within, e.g. unique NFTs.Merch - The exclusive merchandise collection features a range of items, including mugs, sweatshirts, pens, caps, and more.Money - USDT and various other cryptocurrencies will be used for contest prizes and rewards for ambassadors.Exclusive Discord Role, Limited NFT and more.All participants must join the Eontribe's official Twitter, Telegram, DiscordBounty Campaigns are Beta Testing, Referral Program, Ambassador Program, We are hiring , and Social MediaOnly messages in the English language are permitted.Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed.Users with negative reputations are not eligible to participate in our bounty campaign.Impersonating others or using someone else's information in your reports will result in permanent banning.All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.Example:Code:#Proof of authenticationJoined: *campaign name*Bitcointalk Username:Bitcointalk Profile Link:Telegram Username:Wallet address:Welcome to the Eontribe! Find out about our vision, mission, and technical specifications of the project. Our goal is to extend human capabilities, to make human intelligence more effective by training a neural network to the needs of each individual. Eontribe neural networks should become an extension of the human, a digital copy of the human under full user control. As a result, mundane or unpleasant tasks can be shifted to Eontribe, and the user himself can do exactly what brings him pleasure. We suggest to familiarize with the platform and the ways in which it will change the virtual world as we know it.

comments.body: My native language is Spanish. Could I be part of the telegram support team? English only write if I understand audio. When they open for community admin, which from what I see says soon
